title: I cant choose a specific name?
body:
Hello, i am a Silver bard main and i would like to make a smurf called "AnotherBardMain" but for some reason it wont let me?
its 15 out of 16 characters but it just says "That Name Is Unavaliable"

euw btw

replies.body: Are you trying this on the updated or legacy client?  As long as it's 16 characters or less, available, and appropriate then it should be good.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look into this with you.  Be sure to mention which currency type you want to use just in case we can help manually.  We'll get back to you!
